title: Questions a postal clerk might ask
context: Ask a customer what is inside the package they are mailing.

content.bestLine: What's inside the package you're mailing today?

neutral.text: Can you tell me what you're sending?
What's the contents of this package?
Is there anything fragile in the package?
What kind of item are you mailing?

formal.text: Could you please disclose the package contents?
I need to know what you're sending for shipping purposes.
What is the nature of the items in the package?
For shipping records, what is inside the package?
Please inform me of the package's contents.

patterns.template: Can you tell me what [option] package contains?

lines.speaker: Postal Clerk
lines.text: What's inside the package you're mailing today?

lines.speaker: Customer
lines.text: It's a gift for my sister.

lines.speaker: Postal Clerk
lines.text: Could you please disclose the package contents?

lines.speaker: Customer
lines.text: It's a book and some clothes.
